entries.name: altitude
entries.desc: The altitude of the LOC above a reference sphere whose surface sits 100km below the WGS84 spheroid in centimeters as an unsigned 32bit integer

entries.name: hprecision
entries.desc: The horizontal precision using ssize type values in meters using scientific notation as 2 integers of XeY for precision use value/2 e.g. 2m = +/-1m

entries.name: latitude
entries.desc: The latitude for this LOC where 2**31 is the equator in thousandths of an arc second as an unsigned 32bit integer

entries.name: longitude
entries.desc: The longitude for this LOC where 2**31 is the prime meridian in thousandths of an arc second as an unsigned 32bit integer

entries.name: ssize
entries.desc: The spherical size of this LOC in meters using scientific notation as 2 integers of XeY

entries.name: version
entries.desc: Returns the version value for this LOC record which should always be 00

entries.name: vprecision
entries.desc: The vertical precision using ssize type values in meters using scientific notation as 2 integers of XeY for precision use value/2 e.g. 2m = +/-1m

entries.name: new(version, ssize, hprecision, vprecision, latitude, longitude, altitude)
